original_text: The Jewish leaders said to Jesus, ‘The master will completely destroy those bad people. Then he will give the garden to other farmers to take care of it. Those new farmers will give the master the fruit that he should have at the time of harvest.’
korean_text: 그들이 말하되 그 악한 자들을 진멸하고 포도원은 제 때에 열매를 바칠 만한 다른 농부들에게 세로 줄지니이다

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders said to Jesus
The master will completely destroy those bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 주인은 그 악한 사람들을 완전히 멸하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then he will give the garden to other farmers
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 다른 농부들에게 그 동산을 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Those new farmers will give the master the fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그 새로운 농부들은 주인께 열매를 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that he should have at the time of harvest
sentences.korean_translation: 수확 때에 그가 받아야 할 그 열매를
